item.title: How to spin up a cheap Oracle Database in the cloud
item.description: I saw this article from linked in a tweet yesterday and realised I know very little about Oracle’s cloud offering. It seems like this venerable giant of the data industry is not leading the way in the cloud domain. As a curious type, I thought it would be interesting to investigate how to spin up a cheap Oracle database in the cloud using Oracle’s own little known cloud offering and others.
